comments:
If autoparse is on, we end up putting the project on the parse file queue when 
there is a refresh.  This can happen before _cppExtensions has been created.  
The exception is below:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.miners.parser.invocation.PreprocessWorker.isCorCPPFile(Prepr
ocessWorker.java:221)
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.miners.parser.invocation.PreprocessWorker.preprocessFile(Pre
processWorker.java:60)
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.miners.parser.invocation.PreprocessWorker.getFileFromQueue(P
reprocessWorker.java:208)
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.miners.parser.invocation.PreprocessWorker.preprocessFilesFro
mQueue(PreprocessWorker.java:117)
	at 
org.eclipse.cdt.cpp.miners.parser.invocation.PreprocessWorker.run(PreprocessWork
er.java:83)
In the newest parser, this shouldn't happen.
